content.raw: I know this is wontfix but I've been running 0.6 locally and I think this is happening more often than it was before.  I can run the sim about 15 minutes in general before seeing the error.  Has anyone else noticed an uptick in this error?  Cloudsim is still 0.5 (or was yesterday) so unclear if it will affect that.
